Name: [Revelation] Falling Dust
Desc:
[Revelation Skill]
Great malice hits enemies again after a shock wave is generated. Only in the shock wave, Death Blessing grants the blessing of death, and Malice does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.

H.Old:
Consumes 95 MP to attack up to 12 enemies at 515% Damage 10 times and gushes out Malice to attack up to 15 enemies at 370% Damage 15 times.
Cooldown: 14 sec
H.New:
MP Cost: 95. Attacks up to 12 enemies at 515% Damage 10 times and gushes out Malice to attack up to 15 enemies at 370 Damage 15 more times.
Cooldown: 14 sec.

Cooldown: 14 sec
